list.s: Individuals who are being emancipated are eligible to receive up to $500 from the Fund if they formally apply and meet four requirements: 1. Release by the courts 2. Successful completion of all life skills tests 3. Positive termination of his or her Pleasant Run program 4. Possession of a high school diploma or GED
